communications.subject: Freedom of Information Act Request: Renew America’s Schools Grants program
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

All Freedom of Information Requests submitted to the agency between June 1, 2023, and August 5, 2024, that related to the Renew America’s Schools Grants program or any of the 24 programs’ selected Local Educational Agencies listed below:

1. Alexandria City Public Schools, Alexandria, VA 
2. Austin Independent School District, Austin, TX 
3. Baltimore County Public Schools, Windsor Mill, MD 
4. Bridgeport Public Schools (in partnership with the University of Connecticut), Bridgeport, CT 
5. Cass Lake-Bena Public Schools (in partnership with Region Five Development Commission), Cass Lake, MN 
6. Charlo School District, Charlo, MT 
7. Choctaw County School District, Weir, MS 
8. Clinton School District, Clinton, AR 
9. Fairbanks North Star Borough School District, Fairbanks, AK 
10. Greenup County School District, Greenup, KY 
11. Jefferson County School District, Birmingham, AL 
12. Kane County School District, Kanab, UT 
13. Matchbook Learning Centers, Indianapolis, IN 
14. Memphis-Shelby County Schools, Memphis, TN 
15. Natick Public Schools, Natick, MA 
16. North Wasco County School District 21, Mosier, OR 
17. Nottoway County Public Schools, Blackstone, VA 
18. Porterville Unified School District, Porterville, CA 
19. St. Maries School District #41, Saint Maries, ID 
20. Warner Public Schools Oklahoma, Warner, OK 
21. White River School District 47-1, White River, SD 
22. William Penn School District, Yeadon, PA 
23. Williamsfield Schools (CUSD #210) and 19 LEAs, Williamsfield, IL 
24. Winnett Public School District #1, Winnett, MT 

Specifically, I request the following details of each FOIA request: 
1. Name and/or agency/organization that submitted the FOIA
2. Date of the FOIA request
3. Copy of the language used in the initial request

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Tony Fritz
